name: Violin Paradise
overview: Violin Paradise is a game designed for up to four people. Players can choose to be a conductor, violinist, violist or cellist as they are tasked with performing some of the most beautiful classical pieces in history. 1. Solo or up to four-people ensemble, you can always experience brand-new performing enjoyment. 2. A simple but sophisticated control. 3. More than 50 various pieces of compositions to be selected. 4. Abundant splendid visual effects, which will come out increasingly while your performance improves.
